text:
Created attachment 34732
Session support to mod_auth_basic (trunk)

mod_auth_basic cannot use session from mod_session.

Attached patches address this missing feature for trunk and 2.4.x. Session are enabled if mod_session is configured and new option AuthBasicUseSession is set to On.
creator: manu@netbsd.org
manu@netbsd.org
